short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalize ChatGPT, and any other LLM. Build a custom instruction library and retrieve relevant personal data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MiniMe personalizes any LLM application like ChatGPT or CharacterAI for you.

Store your data in a single place, then retrieve and use it anywhere.

Take full control of your data - add, find, edit and delete anything at any time.

Run MiniMe automatically on ChatGPT or Claude using the rendered MiniMe button.
